verses.name: 1 Kings 15:5
verses.text: Because David did that which was right in the eyes of the Lord, and turned not aside from any thing that he commanded him all the days of his life, save only in the matter of Uriah the Hittite.

verses.name: 1 Kings 15:6
verses.text: And there was war between Rehoboam and Jeroboam all the days of his life.

verses.name: 1 Kings 15:7
verses.text: Now the rest of the acts of Abijam, and all that he did, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Judah? And there was war between Abijam and Jeroboam.
